definition: to work for a trial period/worker on probation

sentences.english: Most front-end load testing tools emphasize increasing the arrival rate to produce load.
sentences.chinese: 许多前端负载测试工具强调提高到达率以产生负载。

sentences.english: Bill: Uhuh. Well maybe you could do a trial run before you start officially.
sentences.chinese: 噢，那你是否可以在正式录用之前先试工呢？

sentences.english: 5of the trial personnel try and assessment survey.
sentences.chinese: 对试用人员之试工与考核调查。

sentences.english: Some automated testing tools also use this approach for test development.
sentences.chinese: 一些自动化测试工具也使用这种方法进行测试开发。

sentences.english: The different test tools tried to simulate different types of user environments.
sentences.chinese: 不同的测试工具设法模拟不同类型的用户环境。

sentences.english: Of course, these are still only benchmark tools.
sentences.chinese: 当然，这些仍然只是基准测试工具。

sentences.english: TCPIP testing tools, learning the message control.
sentences.chinese: TCPIP测试工具，学习消息控制。

sentences.english: APR - N testing valve is the main valve of full bore pressure controlling tools in Harlliborton's company.
sentences.chinese: 阀是哈里伯顿公司全通径压控式测试工具的主阀。

sentences.english: Testing tools for the test scenario are custom-made.
sentences.chinese: 测试场景使用的测试工具是定制的。

sentences.english: And you should test the performance gains from the appliance before you purchase.
sentences.chinese: 并且，您应该在购买之前测试工具所带来的性能提升。

sentences.english: Running tools and testing tools for Company's wellheads and X-mas trees.
sentences.chinese: 公司井口装置和采油树的生产和测试工具。

sentences.english: Pick up drill stem test tool.
It makes split-testing much more manageable and less expensive than testing without the tool.
sentences.chinese: 它使分裂更为做得到测试比没有测试工具。

sentences.english: Random-dot stereograms (RDS) do not have monocular cue in testing stereopsis .
sentences.chinese: 乱点立体图是不具单眼线索的立体感测试工具。

definition: to accept a job offer/to apply for an advertised position
labor contract/contract between employer and employees governing wages and conditions
to receive one's regular salary (while on vacation, study leave etc)/paid (leave)/on full pay
to shift holidays, taking a weekday off
piece rate wage/remuneration based on one's output/opposite: time rate wage 計時工資|计时工资[ji4 shi2 gong1 zi1]
to take a vacation/to go on holiday
to replace sb on a workshift/to substitute for
